algorithm

类 MF2DBooleanIncremental

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
      • algorithm.MF2DBoolean
        • algorithm.MF2DBooleanIncremental
  • 直接已知子类:
    MF2DBooleanIncrementalGLG

    public class MF2DBooleanIncremental
extends MF2DBoolean
    Incremental learning for matrix factorization, where data is stand alone.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) double[] favoriteThresholds
      Item predicted rating no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.
      (专用程序包) int incrementalTrainRounds
      Incremental training rounds.

      • 从类继承的字段 algorithm.MF2DBoolean

        alpha, itemSubspace, lambda, NO_REGULAR, PQ_REGULAR, rank, regularScheme, subspaceValueRange, trainRounds, userSubspace

      • 从类继承的字段 algorithm.UserBasedThreeWayRecommender

      • threeWayRecommend

        public int[][] threeWayRecommend(int paraUser)
        Implement the abstract method defined in class UserBasedThreeWayRecommender. It changes static variables currentUserRecommendations and currentUserPromotions.
        覆盖:
        threeWayRecommend 在类中 MF2DBoolean
        参数:
        paraUser - The user.
        返回:
        An integer matrix, where the first row indicates recommended items, while the second indicates promoted ones.
        另请参阅:
        UserBasedThreeWayRecommender.currentUserRecommendations, *
